PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows different standard pages. The pages that using Standard template can contain Medias, which are Illustration, Audio and Video. One page should only cantain at most one media.

Page.Title: Standard page with images, no media
Page.Text: This is a standard page with image and background image. Press next button to get the page with media. The assigned number in last page is {V:MobilePhone}

Page.Title: Standard page with illustration
Page.Text: This is a standard page with illustration.

Page.Title: Standard page with audio
Page.Text: This is a standard page with audio.

Page.Title: Standard page with video
Page.Text: This is a standard page with video.

PageSequence.Name: Get information
PageSequence.ProgramRoomDescription: This is a description for the program room2.
PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows the pages that using Get information template.These pages contains some interactive controls that can collect information from the end users. Numeric input, singleline input, multiline line input, radio buttons, check boxes, drop down list, slider and timepicker. 1 to 5 controls should be shown in one page.

Page.Title: Numeric input page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with Numeric input.

Page.Title: Singleline input page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with Singleline input. You have chosen {V:NumberOfNumeric} in the last page.

Question.Caption: Multiline caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption captioncaption captioncaptioncaptioncaption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption caption

Page.Title: Multiline input page
Page.Text: The input of the Singleline in the last page is {V:TextOfSingleline}. This is a Get information page with Multiline input.

Page.Title: RadioButton page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with RadioButtons.

Page.Title: CheckBox page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with CheckBoxes.

Page.Title: DropDownList page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with DropDownList.

Page.Title: Slider page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with Slider.

Page.Title: TimePicker page
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with TimePicker.

Page.Title: TimePicker page text order 9
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with TimePicker. last minute is {V:TimePickerValue}

Page.Title: TimePicker page text order 10
Page.Text: This is a Get information page with TimePicker.

PageSequence.Name: Push pictures
PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows the pages that just contain one picture each. These page will just be shown for a defined while and the next page will be shown automatically without end user's interaction.

PageSequence.Name: Choose preferences
PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows a series of images in one screen. After user chooses some of the images, it will play some pages with the related description according the chosen images. Up to 9 images can be shown in the first sight.

Page.Text: This is a choose preferences page with 3 images, select max 3 items.

PageSequence.Name: Timer
PageSequence.ProgramRoomDescription: This is a description for the program room3.
PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows a page with timer.

Page.Title: This page shows a timer
Page.Text: Please do something while the timer is running, and stop the timer when you are done.

PageSequence.Name: Line graph
PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows a page with line graph.

Page.Title: This page shows a line graph
Page.Text: This is a line graph shows your progress from week0 to week4. The time in last Timer page is {V:TimeOfAction}

PageSequence.Name: Register
PageSequence.CategoryDescription: This category shows a register page.

Page.Title: Register page
Page.Text: Please input information to register.;Email;Password;Confirm password

Message.Name: QuestionRequired
Message.Title: Question is required
Message.Message: You have one or more questions that required to be finished, please answer.

Message.Name: LoginInfoRequired
Message.Title: Woops!
Message.Message: Please input your username and password to login.

Message.Name: PasswordRemiderInfoRequired
Message.Title: Woops!
Message.Message: Please input your email to retrieve the password.

Message.Name: RegisterInfoRequired
Message.Title: Woops!
Message.Message: Please input your username and password to register.

Message.Name: RegisterPasswordConfirm
Message.Title: Woops!
Message.Message: The passwords that you input are different.
